title: Global basketball shoe sales 2012 - 2013 , by NBA player
summary: This statistic shows a projection with the global revenues of basketball shoe sales in the third Quarter of 2012 and the third Quarter of 2013 .
In the third Quarter of 2013 , 2012 accounted for 2000 % of global SoC shoe revenues .
gold: This timeline depicts global basketball shoe sales in 2012 and 2013 , by NBA player.
In 2013 , Michael Jordan and his shoe brand , Jordan , earned approximately 2.5 billion U.S. dollars .
